name: Shattering Shot
effects: Physical damage (1.2x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce DEF by 50% for 3 turns to one enemy
Reduce resistance to Lightning by 50% for 3 turns to one enemy

desc_long: Deals damage and reduces DEF and lightning resistance for one enemy.
對1名敵人發動攻擊，並降低防禦、雷屬性耐性。
적 1명에게 피해를 주고, 방어력과 번개속성 저항력을 감소시킵니다.
